titleStmt.title: Articles given by [...] and delivered to the church-wardens to be considered and answered in his visitation holden in the year of our Lord God [...] : whereunto the said church-wardens and side-men are upon their oathes to answer truly and particularly.
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

notesStmt.note: Bracketed blank areas in title were to be filled in by the presiding bishop.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
